about_the_game:
"They were here… and they left their mark."

Make an impression on the Bay Area with this flashy pack of customized graffiti-themed gear. Either a statement or a conversation, graffiti is your voice. Leave no surface untagged.

This pack includes:
- Full Urban artist outfit for Marcus
- Urban artist skin for Marcus' weapon
- Urban artist skin for Marcus' drone
- Urban artist skin for Marcus' car
